H3.text: Which country in 2001 became the first to decriminalize recreational drug use. Potiti

A4.text: In 2001, Portugal implemented a law that decriminalized drug use for personal consumption, treating users as patients rather than criminals.

A5.text: The use of heroin and cannabis also increased in Spain and Italy, where drugs for personal use were decriminalised many years earlier than in Portugal.
